version_description:
- changed the Santa boss fight a bit, made it easier to beat.
- new Achievements
- bug fixes

- changed the Santa boss fight a bit, made it easier to beat.
- new Achievements
- bug fixes

To celebrate the release of Shopping Cart Hero 5, we've brought a few awesome upgrades back here to your SCH3 cart:
- get massive airborne points with the new SCH5 party hat!
- new cart upgrades: extra style with under-cart running lights. Get super speed with an aerodynamic spiral nose cone, and attachable Hermes wings!
- ui improvements
- bug fixes, and brought things up to speed for latest iOS versions and device resolutions.
